title: Anne McCaffrey's Dragonflight #1
description: Anne McCaffrey's beloved science fantasy epic becomes a fully-painted graphic novel. Join Lessa, sole remnant of a noble house, as she comes of age and dares to reclaim her birthright--and battles to save Pern from the deadly silver threadfall that threatens devastation of the planet. This is all three volumes in one edition.
author: Brynne Stephens
